name: electrify
content:
electrify verb [T]
(POWER)
Add to word list
Add to word list
to make a machine or system operate using electricity when it did not before: The east coast railway line has been electrified.

You can also find related words, phrases, and synonyms in the topics:
Railways & railway lines
electrify verb [T]
(EXCITE)
to make a person or group extremely excited by what you say or do: She electrified her audience with her vivid stories.

Add to word list
Add to word list
to equip with electricity: They recently electrified this part of the railway line.
If you electrify a group of people, you do something that makes them very excited: Her performance electrified the audience.
